channel.title: Hey guys need some client help :s
channel.description: hey guys, i've made my own server i've made my own client which is 127.0.0.1 and i've made another one for people to join on and when i try to go on that client it works fine but when i go to log in it says error connecting to server i've portfoward and changed the ips the ip is pvpscape614.no-ip.biz i'm not trying to advert so don't say it please help me!
